OK - Not much on real OOP, but OK basic introduction to C#.  One should have some programming experience because the instructor used "if/else" and "for (i..." without explanation.
The music at the beginning and end of each module what sort of a downer.

results.content: The course has been enjoyable and informative so far. I did take the basic course from the instructor and it helped ease me into some of the  basics. The instructor has been helpful in providing me with support on the lessons where I struggled and the students informative too. I can't wait to finish the course and continue my studies with some great experience.
